info.name: WOA forum image auto resizing
info.description: OUTDATED! (23/01/2017) The new forum software has a native image resizer. _______________________________________________ This style resizes oversized images in the Wacken Open Air forums to dimensions which will fit into the columns.
info.additionalInfo: Special thanks to "Guardian of Silence" for figuring out the problem about the two different domains of this forum.
